name: HH_EPSD_CARE_TEAM_HX
description: This table contains the history of any edits made to care team member data.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DISCIPLINE_C_NAME
columns.description: History of the disciplines of Care Team members.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: History of the start date for Care Team members.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: History of the end dates for Care Team members.

columns.name: VISITS_PER_WEEK_CNT
columns.description: History for the number of visits per week for Care Team members.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: History of the provider IDs of Care Team members.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: History of the IDs of users who made edits to the Care Team

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: History of the instant edits were made to the Care Team data.

columns.name: EDIT_LINE
columns.description: History of the line number of the Care Team member whose data was edited. This is the line number found in column LINE of HH_EPSD_CARETEAM
